page.title: 06Clubs in Nibley.
page.content: North Nibley caters for a variety of age groups.For the children there is a toddlers' group and playscheme.The teenagers have a drama and youth club. For the adults there is a W.I.; a Mothers Union;a walkers group & Probus (for retired professional and business men).Also the Tyndale Choral Society is celebrating its 25th anniversary in 1985.The football club in North Nibley has been running for 26 years. The four teams consist of mainly local players.The main pitch is in Waterley Bottom.The W.I. has 28 members who meet once a month.For the elderly there is a over 60's club.Some of these clubs do not run all the year round.They are mainly recreational and a branch of the national organisation. People go mainly for social reasons.
